attributes.action: Close all US military bases in the UK and  don't let them use ours either.
attributes.additional_details: Donald Trump is a Russian agent we don't need foreign troops or personal working against us
attributes.background: Close the bases down and send them home they're not good allies anymore

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/717971
